remarks: The predictate "is a lattice automorphism."  (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2012.)
statement:
lautset.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lautset.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lautset.i $e |- I = ( LAut ` K ) $.
islaut $p |- ( K e. A -> ( F e. I <-> ( F : B -1-1-onto-> B /\ A. x e. B A. y e. B ( x .<_ y <-> ( F ` x ) .<_ ( F ` y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d K x y $.
